_sText:
This is my first ZOMBIEMOD map (zm_).
The scene takes place into an abandonned scientific complex. 

There are a lot of places to hide and face zombies including :

- places to stand alone (pipes, vent, rooms, etc.)
- places to stand in groups (trucks, bigger rooms, containers, etc.)

There is a secret room reachable through a portal. The portal is to be activated after pressing 4 buttons hidden in the map.

There are a few other useless secrets.

There are no way you can camp and spawnkill AFK players.

And I think that is all !
